price: 8. Y quienes rechacen la verdad serán desgraciados y (Al-lah) anulará sus (buenas) acciones.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَتَعۡسٗا لَّهُمۡ وَأَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū fataʿsan lahum wa-aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: and He will cause to be lost
